original_solution_mapping.L1: Their 1st child was born 15 years ago, and therefore is <<15=15>>15 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Their 2nd child was born 1 year after their 15-year-old child, and therefore is 15-1=<<15-1=14>>14 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Their 3rd child was born 4 years after their 14-year-old child, and therefore is 14-4=10 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Their 4th child was born 2 years after their 10-year-old child, and therefore is 10-2=8 years old.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 232.
    Returns: the age of their fourth child in years.
    """
    # L1
    first_child_birth_ago = 15 # Their first child exactly 15 years ago
    first_child_age = first_child_birth_ago

    # L2
    second_child_birth_after_first = 1 # exactly one year after the birth of their first child
    second_child_age = first_child_age - second_child_birth_after_first

    # L3
    third_child_birth_after_second = 4 # on the fourth birthday of their second child
    third_child_age = second_child_age - third_child_birth_after_second

    # L4
    fourth_child_birth_after_third = 2 # Two years after the birth of their third child
    fourth_child_age = third_child_age - fourth_child_birth_after_third

    # FA
    answer = fourth_child_age
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Their 1st child was born {first_child_birth_ago} years ago, and therefore is <<{first_child_birth_ago}={first_child_age}>>{first_child_age} years old.

Their 2nd child was born {second_child_birth_after_first} year after their {first_child_age}-year-old child, and therefore is {first_child_age}-{second_child_birth_after_first}=<<{first_child_age}-{second_child_birth_after_first}={second_child_age}>>{second_child_age} years old.

Their 3rd child was born {third_child_birth_after_second} years after their {second_child_age}-year-old child, and therefore is {second_child_age}-{third_child_birth_after_second}={third_child_age} years old.

Their 4th child was born {fourth_child_birth_after_third} years after their {third_child_age}-year-old child, and therefore is {third_child_age}-{fourth_child_birth_after_third}={fourth_child_age} years old.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Their 1st child was born 15 years ago, and therefore is <<15=15>>15 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Their 2nd child was born 1 year after their 15-year-old child, and therefore is 15-1=<<15-1=14>>14 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Their 3rd child was born 4 years after their 15-year-old child, and therefore is 15-4=11 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Their 4th child was born 2 years after their 11-year-old child, and therefore is 11-2=9 years old.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'first_child_age' (value: 15) was used instead of 'second_child_age' (value: 14).
